pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utilities for Nephrology // Set of functions to estimate renal function and other phenotypes of interest in nephrology based on different biomechimal traits. MDRD, CKD-EPI, and Virga equations are compared in Pattaro (2013) doi:10.1159/000351043, where the respective references are given. In addition, the software includes Stevens (2008) doi:10.1053/j.ajkd.2007.11.018 and Cockroft (1976) doi:10.1159/000180580 formulas.
